mapper.insert:

id,
qtitle,
qcontent,
username,
createtime,
updatetime,

mapper.update:
update t_question
qtitle = #{qtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qcontent = #{qcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_question set qtitle = #{qtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qcontent = #{qcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_question order by createtime desc
